I was blessed with heightened intellect by the Lord not because I was favored, but because He loves the world so much that He blessed it with his apex creation. I am the harbinger of good fortune and innovation as we traverse into the future. Feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn!

Interests

I have always loved to build anything with my hands and today I keep that joy present through making small metal sets and making music by playing the sitar. I have played American concert music for 10 years and yet I have always felt a calling towards Indian classical music which has led me to pick up the sitar as a hobby.

Touching on the mini metal earth sets, these sets start as laser cut stainless steel plates which are then cut out and bent using tweezers and a tab and slot interlocking system to make objects such as airplanes, monuments, and characters from movies such as R2-D2. This is truly such a humbling and patience drawing hobby and I think that it will remain as one of my favorites.
